name: Blue Drifter
description:
Blue drifter is an experimental bounty hunter game set on a harsh rainy planet. Track down criminals with your flying car, and eliminate them to ultimately buy yourself a ticket to outer space, and freedom.




Features
  • 10-20 minutes of playtime.
  • Use a scanner, gun, and vehicle to deal with your targets.
  • Freely roam a miserable rainy planet.
  • A very blue and raw aesthetic.


Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
